author: The Associated Press
description: A retired Army officer who worked as a civilian for the Air Force has pleaded guilty to conspiring to transmit classified information about Russia's war with Ukraine on a foreign online dating platform
title: Retired Army officer pleads guilty to sharing classified info on Russia-Ukraine war on dating site

author: Aria Bendix
description: CENTER POINT, Texas — Local and state officials who responded to the catastrophic flooding this month in Central Texas defended their actions in an interview with NBC News, saying they did everything in their power to save lives and are now considering what more could be done to prevent future tragedies.“Our teams did everything that they possibly could with this gruesome, devastating situation that happened, and we would not change the way we did that.
title: Texas officials defend response to deadly floods: 'We saved as many people as we could'

author: Tim Stelloh
description: Hard drives containing unreleased music from Beyoncé were stolen from her choreographer’s rental vehicle in Atlanta, police said Monday
title: Unreleased music from Beyoncé was stolen from her choreographer's SUV in Atlanta, police say

author: Dan Mangan, CNBC
description: Elon Musk's name loomed large as a jury was selected for the federal trial of a civil lawsuit over a crash of a Tesla Model S that killed a pedestrian.
title: Elon Musk looms over jury selection in Tesla Autopilot fatality trial

author: The Politics Desk
description: Democrats have changed their tune on the Jeffrey Epstein files as they try to exploit a divide between President Donald Trump and his MAGA base.
title: Democrats stoke the flames of MAGA world's Epstein saga: From the Politics Desk

author: Ryan J. Reilly
description: WASHINGTON — Trump administration officials had already reviewed a criminal case against a Utah doctor accused of selling fake Covid vaccination cards and allowed it to proceed before Attorney General Pam Bondi suddenly intervened over the weekend and ordered the case dismissed, a defense attorney said.Dr.
title: Pam Bondi dismissed charges in alleged Covid scam after the case had passed review for 'weaponization'

author: Kaitlin Sullivan
description: A study of more than 1 million people found no link between aluminum in vaccines and an increased risk of autoimmune disease, allergies and autism.
title: Study finds no link between aluminum in vaccines and autism, asthma

author: The Associated Press
description: San Antonio Spurs star Victor Wembanyama expects to play this coming season and has been fully cleared after dealing with deep vein thrombosis in his shoulder for the last few months, he told the French newspaper L'Equipe in remarks published Monday
title: Spurs' Victor Wembanyama says he's been cleared to return after blood clot

author: David K. Li
description: Sheriff's deputies were forced to respond to the discovery of a creepy teddy bear that looked like it was made of bloody human tissue before it was found to be harmless, Southern California authorities said Monday
title: 'Human skin' teddy bear at California bus stop draws law enforcement response

author: Lawrence Hurley
description: The Supreme Court on Monday allowed the Trump administration to carry out a broad layoffs at the Department of Education that were blocked by a federal judge.
title: Supreme Court allows Trump administration to implement widespread Education Department layoffs

author: Dareh Gregorian
description: Former Gov. Andrew Cuomo announced Monday that he will continue his run for New York City mayor after losing to Zohran Mamdani in last month's Democratic primary."I'm in it to win it," Cuomo said in a post on X. Cuomo stepped down as New York governor in 2021 after being hit with numerous sexual harassment allegations, but had been considered the front-runner in the Democratic primary due to his longstanding political ties and influence in the Democratic establishment
title: Andrew Cuomo announces third-party run for NYC mayor, setting up rematch against Zohran Mamdani

author: The Associated Press
description: It was the scariest choking incident David Palumbo had ever seen
title: More elderly Americans are choking to death. Are these devices the answer?

author: Kalhan Rosenblatt
description: Sesame Workshop said the X account for its beloved fuzzy, red monster Elmo was compromised by an "unknown hacker" who made antisemitic and racist posts on Sunday.
title: Sesame Workshop addresses 'disgusting' antisemitic posts on hacked Elmo X account

author: Ashley Capoot, CNBC
description: The U.S. Department of Defense on Monday said it’s granting contract awards of up to $200 million for artificial intelligence development at Anthropic, Google, OpenAI and xAI
title: Anthropic, Google, OpenAI and xAI granted up to $200 million for AI work from Defense Department

author: Steve Kopack
description: Europe is sounding the alarm: Tariffs could soon be hitting wallets of people in the United States
title: E.U. tariffs set to raise pasta and wine prices, threatening jobs on both sides of the Atlantic

author: Shiv Sudhakar, M.D.
description: Popular weight loss medications like Ozempic can help reverse low testosterone levels in men with obesity or Type 2 diabetes, according to new research
title: Weight-loss drugs can boost testosterone levels in men, new research suggests

author: Samantha Genzer
description: "Love Island USA" fans nationwide cheered for winners Amaya Espinal and Bryan Arenales at season seven finale watch parties held at various bars.
title: Hot 'bombshells' crowd bars nationwide for 'Love Island USA' finale

author: Ben Kamisar
description: Democrats are echoing criticism from the right of how President Donald Trump and his administration have handled case files related to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein — a change from Trump’s first term, when Democrats swiftly condemned Trump’s unfounded conspiracy theories about the investigation into the financier and his death
title: Democrats put aside previous misgivings to hit Trump over Jeffrey Epstein files

author: The Associated Press
description: NFL legend John Elway won't be charged in golf cart accident that killed former agent Jeff Sperbeck
title: NFL legend John Elway won't be charged in golf cart accident that killed former agent

author: Juliette Arcodia
description: In Maryland’s Chesapeake Bay, two populations are under threat: the iconic blue crab and the crabbers whose livelihoods depend on them.
title: Maryland's blue crabs — and its crabbers — are having a rough season

author: Jeff Cox, CNBC
description: The Federal Reserve has brought in its inspector general to review a building expansion that has drawn fire from the White House, according to a source familiar with the issue
title: Jerome Powell asks inspector general to review Fed's $2.5B renovation project

author: The Associated Press
description: Curveballs have been thrown a curve by a modern game valuing velocity over variety, disappearing from the major leagues by more than 20,000 annually.
title: As pitchers chase higher velocity, the curveball is disappearing from MLB

author: Marlene Lenthang
description: A California man charged with allegedly murdering his wife and in-laws and dumping his wife’s remains in a trash bin has died by suicide in jail, according to his lawyer and law enforcement sources
title: California man accused of dismembering wife and killing in-laws dies by suicide in jail

author: The Associated Press
description: It used to be that dating was as simple as deciding between dinner, a trip to the movies or an arcade.
title: 'Love Island' revives conversation about racial bias in dating

author: David K. Li
description: Two "aggressive" water buffaloes fatally attacked an Oklahoma man before confronting — and delaying — police and firefighters who responded to care for the victim, authorities said Monday
title: Oklahoma farmer killed by water buffalo he bought just a day prior, police say

author: Gavon Laessig
description: HBO has conjured up the first official image of child actor Dominic McLaughlin in costume as the new Harry Potter from the upcoming reboot of the wildly popular wizarding franchise
title: First look at new Harry Potter in costume from upcoming HBO series

description: Police identified the 47-year-old suspect who was responsible for a spree of crimes including shooting a state trooper, stealing another car and driving to a church where he opened fire on churchgoers. NBC News' Adrienne Broaddus reports on the shooting that left three people dead, including the gunman, a mother and her daughter.
title: Suspect identified in deadly Kentucky church shooting

description: President Trump has announced more Patriot missile batteries will be sent to Ukraine and threatened new tariffs on Russia if a peace agreement is not reached soon. His comments came after meeting with NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte.
title: Trump expresses frustration with Putin, announces new Ukraine support

author: Rob Wile
description: The value of a single bitcoin surpassed $120,000 early Monday, the latest record price for the digital token.
title: Bitcoin surges past $120,000, riding momentum in D.C. and markets

author: Mirna Alsharif
description: The gunman officials say killed two women and wounded a state trooper in Kentucky on Sunday has been identified as 47-year-old Guy House, according to the Lexington Police Department.
title: Officials identify suspect in Kentucky shootings at church and airport

author: The Associated Press
description: A German doctor went on trial in Berlin Monday, accused of murdering 15 of his patients who were under palliative care
title: Doctor accused of murdering 15 patients goes on trial in Germany

author: Marlene Lenthang
description: Central Texas has once again been hit with heavy rains and flooding, prompting rescues and evacuations just 10 days after catastrophic flooding hit the region and killed more than 130 people across the state.
title: Heavy rains return to Texas 10 days after catastrophic flooding

author: Munashe Kwangwari, NBC Boston
description: A tragedy in Fall River, Massachusetts, as a deadly fire tore through an assisted living facility on Sunday night
title: 9 dead, 1 in critical condition after fire at Fall River assisted living facility

author: Astha Rajvanshi
description: Senior aides to King Charles III and Prince Harry were pictured meeting in London on Sunday, fuelling speculation about a royal reconciliation.
title: Royal reconciliation? Senior aides to King Charles III and Prince Harry pictured meeting in London

description: Stacy and Jim Chapin, the parents of Ethan Chapin, one of the four victims in the Idaho college murders case, are speaking out for the first time since Bryan Kohberger's surprise plea deal. In an exclusive interview, they share how they reacted to the chilling confession and how they're honoring their son's memory. NBC's Liz Kreutz reports for TODAY.
title: Exclusive: Idaho Murder Victim Ethan Chapin's Parents Speak Out

author: Mithil Aggarwal
description: Donald Trump will make an unprecendented second state visit to the U.K. in September where he will be hosted by King Charles III and Queen Camilla.
title: Trump to make unprecedented second state visit to the U.K. in September

description: The president's announcement comes ahead of a meeting with NATO secretary general at the White House.
title: Trump to send Patriot missiles to Ukraine

author: Liz Kreutz
description: Ethan Chapin, one of four University of Idaho students stabbed to death in the fall of 2022, had a lighthearted, sometimes goofy presence his family still feels today
title: Parents of slain Idaho student Ethan Chapin say they've found  'big-time closure'

description: Two raging fires have forced hundreds of evacuations at Grand Canyon National Park with some 50 to 80 structures being destroyed including the historic Grand Canyon Lodge. Gusty winds and triple digit temperatures are making containment difficult and the region will remain under a heat warning through Wednesday. NBC’s Steve Patterson reports and TODAY’s Al Roker tracks the latest forecast.
title: Grand Canyon Wildfires Force Evacuations, Destroy Historic Lodge

author: Maddie Ellis, TODAY
description: Olivia Culpo and Christian McCaffrey welcome 1st baby and reveal name
title: Olivia Culpo and Christian McCaffrey welcome 1st baby and reveal name

author: Jana Kasperkevic
description: As immigration arrests ramp up, detainees are raising concerns about food shortages in ICE facilities.
title: ICE detainees go hungry and nicotine poisoning soars in kids: Morning Rundown

author: The Associated Press
description: U.S. President Donald Trump’s special envoy to Ukraine and Russia, retired Lt.
title: Trump envoy arrives in Kyiv as president pledges Patriot missiles to Ukraine

author: Didi Martinez
description: Immigrants being held in ICE detention centers in at least seven states are complaining of hunger, food shortages and spoiled food.
title: Immigrants in overcapacity ICE detention say they're hungry, raise food quality concerns

author: Alexandra Marquez
description: It’s hot election summer — at least according to young Democrats who are organizing behind youthful and progressive candidates in a series of off-year, summertime primaries
title: The Democratic Party's fight over generational change flares in Arizona

author: Allan Smith
description: In the course of a few weeks, Trump has faced a pushback from prominent supporters, including Tucker Carlson.
title: Tucker Carlson leads MAGA's worried warriors in questioning Trump

author: Becca Wood, TODAY
description: One year after Shannen Doherty died of breast cancer, her loved ones are remembering the “Charmed” and “Beverly Hills, 90210” actor
title: Shannen Doherty remembered on 1-year anniversary of her death by Sarah Michelle Gellar and more

author: The Associated Press
description: Clashes between local militias and clans in Syria have killed more than 30 people and injured nearly 100.
title: At least 30 killed in clashes between Druze militias and Sunni Bedouin clans in Syria

author: The Associated Press
description: PRAIRIE ISLAND INDIAN COMMUNITY, Minn. — Some Native Americans traditionally bestow bald eagle feathers at ceremonies to mark achievements, such as graduations, and as a form of reverence for the bird they hold sacred as a messenger to the Creator
title: Bald eagle's new status as the official U.S. bird brings pride and hope to many Native Americans

author: Erika Edwards
description: The number of young children sickened after getting their little hands on nicotine products like pouches and vape e-liquids has skyrocketed in recent years
title: Nicotine poisonings soar in babies and toddlers

author: NBC News
description: Morgan Chesky, who has returned to his hometown of Kerrville, Texas, to report on the deadly Texas floods, will be hosting a Reddit AMA on Monday at 9 a.m. CT.
title: NBC's Morgan Chesky, a Kerrville native, to host Reddit AMA on Texas floods
